summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5588 for the improvement of 21st Avenue Southwest, from West Barton Street to West Henderson Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 73388, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
